ygData.subject: Purchasing from gypsies
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question about purchasing items from the gypsies. I heard a rumor that killing the bandits in Lesser Faydark negatively affects your faction with the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question about purchasing items from the gypsies. I heard a rumor
that killing the bandits in Lesser Faydark negatively affects your faction
with the gypsies in addition to your faction with the Dervish Cutthroats.
When you kill a bandit, you get the message your faction with the Dervish
Cutthroats decreased, but no mention of the gypsies. I haven't tried to
purchase anything from the gypsies yet because I have not adventured on
Antonica yet. Just want to make sure that I'm not hurting my faction with
them by killing bandits in Lesser Faydark.

Thanks

Galtin
E'ci
